China says it has conducted patrols in waters near KinmenChina's Fujian coast guard conducted patrols in waters near Kinmen on Feb. 25, China Coast Guard said. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 08:10:58 GMT ZPY4ATBFDZKF7AN2QXOMSQ7OTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-it-has-conducted-patrols-waters-near-kinmen-2024-02-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Facing Chinese EV rivals, Europe's automakers squeeze suppliers on costsEurope's automakers and their already-stretched suppliers face a tough year as they race to cut costs for electric models to counter leaner Chinese rivals which are bringing cheaper vehicles to challenge them on their home turf. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 06:06:55 GMT VFFJE7R7UROAXCF5ZXOP2M6TDE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/faceing-chinese-ev-rivals-europes-automakers-squeeze-suppliers-costs-2024-02-25/Nick Carey商业汽车与交通
Australia sweep T20 series against NZ in rain-affected clashAustralia completed a clean sweep of their three-match Twenty20 series against New Zealand on Sunday as Matthew Wade's side won a rain-affected clash by 27 runs via the Duckworth-Lewis method at Eden Park. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 04:48:34 GMT 75UUIJNL7NIU7ADDUBXAX托威https://www.reuters.com/sports/cricket/australia-sweep-t20-series-against-nz-rain-affected-clash-2024-02-25/Reuters运动的蟋蟀
Switzerland doubtful Russia will join start of Ukraine peace summitRussia is unlikely to take part at the outset of a high-level Ukraine peace conference which neutral Switzerland plans to host in the coming months, Swiss President Viola Amherd was quoted as saying by a newspaper on Saturday. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 11:45:53 GMT Z3HNJVG2VJMNLHG7UJTTOLVJLU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/switzerland-doubtful- Russia-will-join-start-ukraine-peace-summit-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Chinese turn to Ivankovic after Jankovic contract terminatedBranko Ivankovic has been named China's new head coach, replacing Aleksandar Jankovic after the Serbian failed to take the country beyond the group phase of last month's Asian Cup. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 07:40:50 GMT WIGOTFSQRFMUVHOZTTUTDZDDVU https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/chinese-turn-ivankovic-after-jankovic-contract-termminate-2024-02-24/Michael Church运动的足球
Asian Cup-winning coach Lopez handed Qatar contract until 2026Qatar's Asian Cup-winning coach Marquez Lopez has been handed a contract until 2026 and will take charge of the team in a full-time capacity, the Qatar Football Association has announced. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 00:26:52 GMT KDNFP5E4B5IF7BH5QCGMZSA3RQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/asian-cup-looking-coach-lopez-handed-qatar-contract-until-2026-2024-02-24/Reuters运动的足球
